item.description:
Location:


Had enough of politics as usual, religious fanatics, superstitions and the lack of logic in todays society? Yearning to talk with someone rational for awhile? We meet at TGI Fridays in Seekonk, MA. Have a drink or two and and enjoy some food while we engage in our conversation.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask the girls in the front where the RI Skeptics Society is sitting.
item.name: Rhode Island Skeptics Society November Meetup
